articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Sunchon Cement Complex
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Sunchon Cement Complex
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of the Sunchon Cement Complex.
					 Going round various parts of the complex, he encouraged the technicians and workers registering successes in putting the cement industry on a Juche basis.
					
					 A consultative meeting was held to discuss the issues arising in normalizing the cement production and take measures for the relevant units to provide enough raw and other materials necessary for normal production.
					
					 The premier also inspected the Songyong Paint Factory and the Ryugyong Kimchi Factory and discussed the issues for further completing the Korean-style paint production process and increasing the Kimchi production.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets Swiss Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets Swiss Ambassador
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Swiss Ambassador to the DPRK Jean-Jacques de Dardel on Friday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho Meets Swiss Ambassador
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho Meets Swiss Ambassador
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho Friday had a talk with Jean-Jacques de Dardel, Swiss ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: U.S. Missile Warning Drill with Japan and S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Missile Warning Drill with Japan and S. Korea under Fire
Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- The director general of the Institute of Disarmament and Peace of the DPRK Foreign Ministry released the following statement on Friday:
					Of late, the U.S. has staged another missile warning drill with Japan and the south Korean puppet forces in the waters around the Korean peninsula under the pretext of detecting and tracking the DPRK ballistic missile.
					
					The U.S.-led missile warning drill, the fourth of its kind this year, is a serious military provocation further exacerbating the grave situation of the Korean peninsula and the region.
					
					The U.S. continuously stages various kinds of joint military exercises against the DPRK including two times of missile warning drills in 2016 and four times in 2017. This fact alone fully illustrates the extreme level of the insane military provocations of the Trump administration.
					
					The U.S. missile warning drill is aimed at accelerating the building of the Missile Defence System and the formation of tripartite military alliance of the U.S., Japan and south Korea to maintain the military supremacy in the Asia-Pacific region under the pretext of coping with the "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					Such attempts by the U.S. will inevitably bring about a new arms race and a new cold war in the Korean peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					The missile warning drill aimed at putting maximum pressure upon the DPRK follows the largest joint naval and air drills staged recently by the Trump administration, mobilizing the three nuclear aircraft carriers and hundreds of fighter planes with a great number of nuclear preemptive strike means.
					
					We will never tolerate the on-going dangerous war games conducted by the U.S. while condemning the strengthening of the DPRK's self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					The reality shows that the DPRK was absolutely right in having strengthened its powerful nuclear deterrent which could end for good the 60-year-long nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. against the DPRK and firmly guarantee the security and prosperity of the Korean nation and peace of the Korean Peninsula and the region.
					
					Any country, if it is really interested in stability of the Korean Peninsula, should condemn the continuous nuclear war provocations and hostile policy of the U.S. against the DPRK, instead of criticizing the DPRK's efforts to develop its strategic nuclear weapons for defending the sovereignty, the territorial integrity and peaceful life of its people from the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Will Be Made to Pay Dearly for Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Will Be Made to Pay Dearly for Anti-DPRK Moves
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Consultative Council for National Reconciliation gave answer to a question raised by KCNA Friday over the fact that the south Korean puppet regime additionally announced a "plan for independent sanctions on the north".
					 On December 10 the puppet regime of south Korea made public the document with its chief executive's visit to China just ahead under the pretext of the DPRK's test-fire of Hwasong-15, the spokesman said, adding:
					
					 This is another intolerable politically-motivated provocation to the DPRK and a vicious challenge to the expectation of the public at home and abroad for national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 We cannot but speak ill of the poor and servile act of the colonial slaves who, without an iota of national self-respect, consider the sanctions on their fellow countrymen in the north as an "offering" for big powers.
					
					 What is all the more ridiculous is that they are bluffing that the recent step would have "a great blow on the north's nuclear and missile development" even though they have neither means and ways nor any financial power to put sanctions on the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet forces' sanctions farce is just as foolish an act as trying to check the violent current with rotten net.
					
					 Utterly deplorable is the appearance of the puppet forces as they try to give impression that they are taking an active advantage of the U.S. racket for international sanctions and pressure on the DPRK in order to win favor of the boss of the world hooligans.
					
					 They should clearly understand that stern and merciless is our method of dealing with the group of traitors challenging the cause and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 The foolish sanctions and pressure racket of the rabid dogs serving the U.S. will only make them pay a dear price.
					
					 The puppet authorities will be made to hold full responsibility for all the ensuing consequences as they are adding more crimes, far from apologizing for the crimes they already committed.

articles.title: Young Vanguard Renew Their Pledge
articles.content:
Young Vanguard Renew Their Pledge
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting of the young vanguard took place at the plaza of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Friday.
					 Present there were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials of the youth league and youth and students.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Led by Pak Chol Min, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, the participants vowed to win the final victory in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, true to the behest of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Russian Defense Ministry Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Russian Defense Ministry Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Defense Ministry of Russia led by Victor Kalganov, vice-director of the National Defense Command Center of the Russian Federation, visited Mangyongdae, birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The visitors looked round relics preserved there with care, being briefed on the life of the President.
					
					 The delegation toured the Museum of Weapons and Equipment of the Korean People's Army and the International Friendship Exhibition House and laid bouquets before the Liberation Tower and at the cemetery of the martyrs of the Soviet Army in Sadong District.

articles.title: Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on Dec. 12 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Upon the authorization by the king and the great queen, a delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace who doubles as chairman of the Cambodian Committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il, laid the floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Nigerian President Sends Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Nigerian President Sends Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, sent a floral basket to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					 The floral basket was placed at the statues on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Abroad
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Families of Zhang Wei-hua, a Chinese anti-Japanese revolutionary martyr, Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, and Kim Sun Ok, a China-resident Korean related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, sent floral baskets to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The floral baskets were laid at the statues on Friday.

articles.title: DPRK Witnesses Dozens of Nanotechnology Achievements This Year
articles.content:
DPRK Witnesses Dozens of Nanotechnology Achievements This Year
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- DPRK officials and scientists in the field of nanotechnology have made dozens of nanotechnology achievements this year.
					 The Nanotechnology Center of the Institute of Advanced Science of Kim Il Sung University manufactured a powerful ultrasonic processing machine with an output of 1 200W our own way.
					
					 It makes it possible to mass-produce nano-materials at low cost.
					
					 Researchers at Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University made bandages for treating burns from natural macromolecular substance and nano-silver separated from material abundant in the country.
					
					 The Material Engineering Department of Kim Chaek University of Technology used new nano-material for developing high-performance cutting tools capable of processing material with precision and security at a high speed and temperature.
					
					 The Agricultural Nanotechnology Center of the Institute of Agricultural Science developed nano-silicon fertilizer and applied it to on co-op farms in North and South Phyongan Provinces, thus considerably increasing the per-hectare yield of rice.
					
					 The State Nanotechnology Bureau set up a new process for putting the production of nano-micronutrient fertilizer for rice and vegetable farming on an industrial base.

articles.title: Scientific Research Activities Brisk at Universities
articles.content:
Scientific Research Activities Brisk at Universities
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Universities in the DPRK have settled many sci-tech problems to be conducive to putting the national economy on a Juche and modern basis and normalizing the production.
					 Research groups of Kim Il Sung University developed and introduced into the Pyongyang Bag Factory a computer-aided pattern recognizer to put the cutting process on an IT basis and solved hundreds sci-tech problems arising in modernizing different factories like the Ryugyong Kimchi Factory, Ryuwon Footwear Factory and Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory.
					
					 Research groups of Kim Chaek University of Technology also solved many sci-tech problems arising in establishing the integrated production system at factories honored with the field guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un and putting their production processes on an automated and unmanned basis, thus making contributions to putting the national economy on a Juche and modern basis.
					
					 Educators and researchers of Pyongyang University of Architecture completed thousands of architectural blueprints for over 200 projects.
					
					 Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering contributed a large share to the designing and automation of production processes at the Sungri Motor Complex, Kumsong Tractor Factory and other main industrial establishments.
					
					 Such achievements were also made by many other universities including Hamhung University of Chemical Engineering, Phyongbuk University and Hwangbuk University.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Strengthening Railway Sector
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Strengthening Railway Sector
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Many achievements have been made in a drive to strengthening the material and technical foundation of the railways this year, a year of weighty significance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					 At least 20 workshops were built by railway bureaus and branches across the country to produce 3 times more concrete sleepers than last year.
					
					 Amid the modernization of railways, the yearly plan for changing rails with welded ones was completed at 108.7 percent.
					
					 The Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex brought about a great innovation in the production of railway vehicles by making detailed arrangement of production processes, while keeping the supply of raw materials ahead of others. 
					
					 And processes for producing high-tensile round steel and bearing-metal were completed at the Wonsan Rolling-Stock Complex and the Rahung Railway Factory, thus making it possible to put production of wheels of carriages and different accessories on a normal basis.
					
					 Scientists of the railway institute introduced the computer-controlled interlocking system into railway stations along the Hyesan-Samjiyon broad-gauge railway, and have directed big efforts to drawing up the railroad schedule in a scientific way.
					
					 Meanwhile, LED semaphore, ultrasonic detector for structure and others were made to ensure the promptness and safety of railway transportation.

articles.title: Vigorous Struggle for Final Victory in Building Socialist Power Called for
articles.content:
Vigorous Struggle for Final Victory in Building Socialist Power Called for
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in an editorial Friday says that the 8th Conference of Munitions Industry was held with splendor amid deep concern, expectation and best wishes of all servicepersons and civilians across the country.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un personally attended the conference, guided its whole course and made a historic conclusion. This serves as an immortal programme as it clearly indicated the important tasks and ways for further glorifying the country as the world's strongest nuclear and military power, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 The conference is the one of faith that displayed once again the fixed will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people to invariably hold fast to the banner of the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts until the revolutionary cause of Juche is accomplished.
					
					 The line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force is a strategic line set forth by our Party to defend the supreme interests of our revolution and make our people enjoy the socialist benefits to the full under guarantee by powerful war deterrent.
					
					 The conference was held at a time when the U.S. imperialists' nuclear threat and blackmail, sanctions and pressure moves against the DPRK have gone beyond the limited line. It clearly showed how strong are the faith and will of our people to further increase the self-reliant defense capability, holding higher the banner of simultaneously developing the two fronts under any circumstances.
					
					 It was a significant conference that demonstrated the steadfast will of the Korean people to conquer the peak of socialist victory in the shortest period with the same spirit and vigor as shown in the course of bringing about a series of great events to be specially recorded in the history of building the Juche-based nuclear forces.
					
					 The DPRK is now dynamically advancing on the basis of the nation's historic achievements made in bolstering up the self-reliant defense capability.
					
					 The editorial calls upon all the people to hold fast to the WPK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts as eternal treasured sword and carry on the dynamic struggle to hasten the final victory in building a powerful socialist country with redoubled efforts and confidence.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. Muscle-based Policy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. Muscle-based Policy
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Lockheed Martin is going to offer hundreds of MK54 mini-torpedoes to the military in future five years, according to a recent report by the U.S. magazine The National Interest.
					 The U.S. is reportedly pushing ahead with the development of a new type high-precision weapon with much longer range and higher hit accuracy than the tactical ground-to-ground missiles deployed in the U.S. army at present. The weapon, which can hit a target 500 km away with pinpoint accuracy, will be on trial in 2020.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says:
					
					 Recent military moves of the U.S. are just a vivid manifestation of its power-based policy to contain its strategic rivals in Northeast Asia by keeping its military edge and to realize its wild ambition for dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. is getting crazy about the arms buildup, persistently resorting to the anachronistic muscle-based policy of confrontation.
					
					 Such reckless moves are further straining the situation in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 This clearly shows that the U.S. is just a cancer-like entity harassing peace in the region and the world.
					
					 However, such insanity can neither be justified nor be realized.

articles.title: Song Yong Mu Is Most Vicious Traitor to Be Eliminated as Soon as Possible: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Song Yong Mu Is Most Vicious Traitor to Be Eliminated as Soon as Possible: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- Traitor Song Yong Mu, puppet defense minister of south Korea, at the recent plenary meeting of the parliamentary defense committee, said that if the U.S. requests a sea blockade against the north, they will examine the request positively and join in the blockade, and that he agrees with lawmakers from the opposition party on the redeployment of tactical nukes.
					 Prior to the meeting, he, at a "lecture," said that even if the U.S. were to transfer the OPECON (wartime operation control) to south Korea, there would not be the withdrawal of U.S. forces from south Korea and the disorganization of the south Korea-U.S. "combined forces command".
					
					 Commenting on the fact, Minju Joson Friday says that the remarks of Song, no more than a living corpse, are like barking of a rabid dog at the moon.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 What can never be overlooked is that he did not hesitate to cry out for the U.S. imperialist aggression forces' permanent presence in south Korea and for "sea blockade" on the DPRK, which are a mockery of the nation.
					
					 The successive puppet defense ministers of south Korea were keen on confrontation but Song is the most vicious of them.
					
					 Song is a disgrace to the nation and the worst traitor to be eliminated as soon as possible as he acts as a servant of the U.S. openly crying out for "total extermination" of the Korean nation, while trying hard to remove the DPRK's nuclear treasured sword guaranteeing the security and future of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in France
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in France
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in France on Dec. 7.
					 Benoit Quennedey, president of the France-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il in the run-up to the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Spain
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A Spanish committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Dec. 8.
					 Victor Manuel Lucas, international secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the People of Spain, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il in the run-up to the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Amur Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation on Dec. 11.
					 L. A. Kobuizov, first secretary of the Amur Regional Committee of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il in the run-up to the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Brazil
 Pyongyang, December 15 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the Committee of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil on Dec. 11.
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the party, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events including a remembrance meeting and film show in the run-up to the 6th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju recorre el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, visito el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon.
					Estando en varios lugares del complejo, Pak estimulo a los tecnicos y obreros que estan logrando exitos en la jucheanizacion de la industria de cemento.
					
					En la reunion de consulta convocada se discutieron los problemas pendientes en la produccion normal de cemento y se tomaron las medidas para que las unidades vinculadas suministren suficientes materias primas y materiales necesarios a la normalizacion de produccion.
					
					Pak recorrio tambien la Fabrica de Materias de Pintura de Songyong y la Fabrica de Kimchi de Ryugyong, donde consulto los problemas para perfeccionar mas los procesamientos de produccion de materias de pintura y para aumentar la produccion de plato tradicional.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con Jean-Jacques de Dardel
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con Jean-Jacques de Dardel 
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio este viernes con el embajador suizo en la RPDC, Jean-Jacques de Dardel, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Director de IDP de MINREX de RPDC condena ejercicios militares de fuerzas hostiles
articles.content:
Director de IDP de MINREX de RPDC condena ejercicios militares de fuerzas hostiles
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El director del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 15 la siguiente declaracion:
					Recientemente, EE.UU. volvio a perpetrar con Japon y los titeres surcoreanos en las aguas perifericas de la Peninsula Coreana los ejercicios de alarma de misil, con el pretexto de detectar y perseguir los cohetes balisticos de la RPDC.
					
					Este entrenamiento, realizado por cuarta vez en este ano bajo auspicios de EE.UU., deviene una gran provocacion militar que agrava mas la ya tensa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno.
					
					Mientras que desarrolla sin cesar los simulacros conjuntos de toda indole en la Peninsula Coreana y sus alrededores, EE.UU. efectuo con sus lacayos japoneses y surcoreanos los ejercicios de alarma de misiles dos veces en el ano pasado y 4 veces en el presente, lo cual muestra en que grado llego la demencia militar de la banda de Trump.
					
					Con el pretexto de hacer frente a la "amenaza nuclear y de misiles" de alguien, EE.UU. persigue el objetivo principal de dar mas acicate al establecimiento del sistema antimisil y la fabricacion de la alianza tripartita militar para mantener su supremacia militar en la region Asia-Pacifico, que causaran inevitablemente la nueva carrera armamentista y la "nueva guerra fria" en la region del Noreste de Asia incluso a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Para presionar al maximo al pais socialista, la banda de Trump libro hace poco los ejercicios conjuntos maritimos de mayor envergadura en la historia con la participacion de las 3 flotillas de ataque de portaaviones nucleares y los ejercicios conjuntos aereos de gran tamano movilizando cientos de aviones y los medios de ataque preventivo nuclear y desplego de nuevo con Japon y los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios militares en cuestion.
					
					No podemos estar con brazos cruzados ante la peligrosa aventura militar de EE.UU. que se desarrolla acusando el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC.
					
					La realidad muestra cuan justo es el hecho de que la RPDC dispuso del poderoso disuasivo nuclear capaz de acabar con la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU., que perduraba mas de medio siglo, y garantizar firmemente la seguridad y la prosperidad de la nacion coreana y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y la region.
					
					Quienquiera que tuviera interes en la estabilidad de la situacion de la Peninsula, debe cuestionar primero las incesantes provocaciones de guerra nuclear y la politica de hostilidad a la RPDC de EE.UU., en vez de acusar el desarrollo de las armas nucleares estrategicas de la RPDC para defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais y la vida pacifica de la poblacion.

articles.title: Titeres surcoreanos pagaran muy caro su campana anti-RPDC: advierte el CRN
articles.content:
Titeres surcoreanos pagaran muy caro su campana anti-RPDC: advierte el CRN
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que las autoridades titeres surcoreanas publicaron adicionalmente el "proyecto de sancion independiente contra el Norte de Corea", el portavoz del Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional dio el dia 15 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					El pasado dia 10, los titeres surcoreanos publicaron el proyecto mencionado en visperas de la visita del mandatario a China cuestionando el lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM tipo "Hwasong-15" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					Lo calificamos de otra intolerable provocacion politica contra la RPDC y de desafio frontal a la esperanza de los nacionales y los extranjeros en la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Causa la repugnancia la conducta humillante de los esclavos coloniales surcoreanos que no tienen ni la minima dignidad nacional y consideran la sancion contra la parte connacional como un "tributo" a las potencias. 
					
					Lo mas ridiculo del caso es que ellos, que no tienen ni un medio, ni un metodo, ni una capacidad financiera para sancionar a la RPDC, dicen que la presente medida "dara un golpe fuerte al desarrollo de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte". 
					
					Es una estupidez la farsa de sancion de ellos que intentan agradarle a EE.UU., caudillo de gangsteres internacionales, al incorporarse activamente en su campana internacional de sancion y presion anti-RPDC.
					
					Ellos deben tener presente que es riguroso y despiadado el metodo de castigo a los traidores que desafian a nuestra causa y regimen. 
					
					Costara muy caro la necia campana de sancion y presion de los perros fieles a EE.UU. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas, que abultan su expediente criminal lejos de pedir disculpas, asumiran la responsabilidad de todas sus consecuencias.

articles.title: Jovenes coreanos deciden llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche
articles.content:
Jovenes coreanos deciden llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche 
Pyongyang, 15 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan el acto de juramento de los vanguardias juveniles para llevar a feliz termino  la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la guia del Partido sosteniendo altamente el legado del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					  En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Hwi, los funcionarios de la Union de la Juventud y los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					  Los participantes rindieron homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					  Siguiendo la voz guia de Pak Chol Min, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista, ellos juraron lograr sin falta la victoria final en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un sosteniendo con fidelidad el legado del Dirigente.
